story.text: SAN FRANCISCO Jan 3 Clothing retailer Men's Wearhouse (MW.N) on Wednesday backed its fourth-quarter profit outlook, saying net earnings per share would range from 72 cents to 76 cents. The company also said it sees earnings per share before items of 68 cents to 72 cents. The retailer's fiscal fourth quarter ends Feb. 3.
story.title: men ' s wearhouse backs 4th - qtr profit outlook
